headline: Old Dominion Freight Line, Inc. (ODFL): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Old Dominion Freight Line, Inc. on FluentInQuality’s Substack. In this article, we will summarize the bull’s thesis on ODFL. Old Dominion Freight Line, Inc.’s share was trading at $156.03 on 19th June. ODFL’s trailing and forward P/E ratios were 29.27 and 30.49, respectively, according to Yahoo Finance.
